svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 26 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 26, 2024" date: "2024-10-26"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #199): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being
debugged & fixed EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch
to using due to lack of infrastructure support EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled
for inclusion in Pectra Gas limit (set by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator
defaults and what mechanism to use Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth
error codes
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping
subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch to using due to lack of infrastructure support
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled for inclusion in Pectra
Pectra upgrade:
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed
Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch to using due to
lack of infrastructure support
EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch to using due to
â€¢ EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled for inclusion in Pectra
â€¢ Gas limit (set by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator defaults and what
mechanism to use
Gas limit (set by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator defaults and what mechanism
to use
â€¢ Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth error codes
Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth error codes
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Weekly testing call #10 : peerdas-devnet-3 still unfinalized, fusaka-devnet-0 ~1 week away
Amsterdam upgrade
â€¢ Stateless implementers call #26 : upcoming Circle SNARK weekly seminars, Verkle measurements from
replaying ~200k historical blocks and gas cost spec discussion
Layer 1
â€¢ EIP7732 ePBS: ePBS breakout #12 : support for all-in-one fork choice proposal, devnet proceeding as
planned, consensus specs can then be updated with fork choice proposal
EIP7732 ePBS:
â€¢ ePBS breakout #12 : support for all-in-one fork choice proposal, devnet proceeding as planned,
consensus specs can then be updated with fork choice proposal
â€¢ Xatu dataset adds execution layer data in Parquet format from genesis
Xatu dataset adds execution layer data in Parquet format from genesis
Research
â€¢ Anders Elowsson: practical endgame on issuance policy , proposes curves to temper growth or
alternatively set a 0.5% issuance rate for now
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v3.0.0-alpha5 : faster time on tip of chain, less time needed to download
blobs, fix for v3.0.0-alpha4 crashes; resync required
â€¢ Erigon v3.0.0-alpha5 : faster time on tip of chain, less time needed to download blobs, fix for
v3.0.0-alpha4 crashes; resync required
For stakers
â€¢ Update consensus layer clients so the network bandwidth changes of IDONTWANT messages can be
observed
Layer 2
â€¢ Helios (light client): adds OP Stack support; demo syncing mainnet, OP Mainnet & Base
Helios (light client): adds OP Stack support; demo syncing mainnet, OP Mainnet & Base
â€¢ Arbitrum One time lock extended to 8 days (up from 3 days)
Arbitrum One time lock extended to 8 days (up from 3 days)
â€¢ ApeChain (Arbitrum Orbit L3) live
ApeChain (Arbitrum Orbit L3) live
â€¢ Arbitrum Orbit fast withdrawals for AnyTrust chains : up to 15 minute frequency, trust assumption on
fast withdrawals committee
Arbitrum Orbit fast withdrawals for AnyTrust chains : up to 15 minute frequency, trust assumption on
â€¢ L2 Standards EVM equivalence breakout (RollCall #8.1)
L2 Standards EVM equivalence breakout (RollCall #8.1)
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode EIP7792 : Verifiable logs EIP7793 :
TXINDEX opcode EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode
EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode
â€¢ EIP7792 : Verifiable logs
EIP7792 : Verifiable logs
â€¢ EIP7793 : TXINDEX opcode
EIP7793 : TXINDEX opcode
â€¢ EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7794 : Grant registry ERC7795 : Wallet transaction intents ERC7796 :
Conditional send transaction RPC
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7794 : Grant registry
ERC7794 : Grant registry
â€¢ ERC7795 : Wallet transaction intents
ERC7795 : Wallet transaction intents
â€¢ ERC7796 : Conditional send transaction RPC
ERC7796 : Conditional send transaction RPC
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry forge-std v1.9.4 : adds cheatcodes for gas snapshots, random bytes, mock calls, debug trace
recording, remember keys & get wallets
Foundry forge-std v1.9.4 : adds cheatcodes for gas snapshots, random bytes, mock calls, debug trace
â€¢ Remix contract verification plugin : verify on Etherscan, Sourcify & Blockscout at the same time
Remix contract verification plugin : verify on Etherscan, Sourcify & Blockscout at the same time
â€¢ PRBMath v4.1.0 (Solidity library): adds UD21x18 alias for uint128 & SD21x18 alias for int128
PRBMath v4.1.0 (Solidity library): adds UD21x18 alias for uint128 & SD21x18 alias for int128
â€¢ Etherscan API v2 : multichain with single API key for all supported chains, beta
Etherscan API v2 : multichain with single API key for all supported chains, beta
â€¢ Coinbase OnchainKit Checkout (React component): accepts USDC payments
Coinbase OnchainKit Checkout (React component): accepts USDC payments
â€¢ Safe multisig transaction hashes : Bash script to generate Safe transaction hashes to cross-check
with Ledger; Safe hash preview : hosted UI with additional trust assumptions
Safe multisig transaction hashes : Bash script to generate Safe transaction hashes to cross-check with
Ledger; Safe hash preview : hosted UI with additional trust assumptions
â€¢ Veritas : Circom circuit testing using Go
Veritas : Circom circuit testing using Go
Security
â€¢ Tapioca DAO $4.7M exploit via private key compromise starting with fake job offer on LinkedIn
Tapioca DAO $4.7M exploit via private key compromise starting with fake job offer on LinkedIn
â€¢ DAO governance common vulnerabilities
DAO governance common vulnerabilities
Ecosystem
â€¢ More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap: Minimize staking centralization risks (the Scourge) :
fix block construction pipeline and staking economics Easy block verification (the Verge) : stateless
verification (Verkle or STARKs) and validity proofs of EVM execution & consensus
More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap:
â€¢ Minimize staking centralization risks (the Scourge) : fix block construction pipeline and staking
economics
Minimize staking centralization risks (the Scourge) : fix block construction pipeline and staking
â€¢ Easy block verification (the Verge) : stateless verification (Verkle or STARKs) and validity proofs
of EVM execution & consensus
Easy block verification (the Verge) : stateless verification (Verkle or STARKs) and validity proofs of
EVM execution & consensus
â€¢ Hackathon projects: ETHGlobal San Francisco finalists & ETHSofia
Hackathon projects: ETHGlobal San Francisco finalists & ETHSofia
Enterprise
â€¢ Stripe acquiring Bridge (stablecoin payments) for a reported $1.1B
Job Listings
â€¢ Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
â€¢ Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
11k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
â€¢ 11k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,399 - $2,747, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,399 - $2,747, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Rune: proposals to recenter Maker brand
Rune: proposals to recenter Maker brand
â€¢ Kain Warwick: retrospective of Infinex patron sale rather than a VC seed round
Kain Warwick: retrospective of Infinex patron sale rather than a VC seed round
â€¢ Safe multichain deployment : deploy at same address, no gas fees on major L2s
Safe multichain deployment : deploy at same address, no gas fees on major L2s
â€¢ Gitcoin Grants 22 : open source software rounds on Arbitrum; mint attestations of donations
Gitcoin Grants 22 : open source software rounds on Arbitrum; mint attestations of donations
â€¢ AD : Buy an NFT to tweet once as @evan_van_ness . Auction ends Monday morning, some restrictions
apply
AD : Buy an NFT to tweet once as @evan_van_ness . Auction ends Monday morning, some restrictions apply
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Binance employee Tigran Gambaryan released from Nigeria
Binance employee Tigran Gambaryan released from Nigeria
â€¢ WSJ reports that Tether is under investigation by SDNY ; CEO denies
WSJ reports that Tether is under investigation by SDNY ; CEO denies
General
â€¢ Transak third party KYC vendor data breach via compromised employee credentials
Transak third party KYC vendor data breach via compromised employee credentials
â€¢ Secp256k1-node vulnerability allows private key extraction over ECDH
Secp256k1-node vulnerability allows private key extraction over ECDH
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-26-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )

Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)

Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
